This game is the kinda game that hurts so good. To save yourself some madness, just toss a 'GG' into post-game chat and move on, don't linger. Perks kinda suck to farm if you get unlucky, and not having decent perks makes the game pretty tough pretty quick once your rank starts climbing. Bad perks and better players makes you a little better each match though, just gotta turn it off sometimes and come back later after a chillout.

キラーは確かに難しいですが、４吊りした時の達成感がいいですね。

いろいろ言われていますが、おすすめです！

Oyun fikir açısından muazzam. Her güncellemeyle yeni mekanikler ekleniyor ve oyun keyfini arttırıyor ancak tadınızı kaçıracak unsurlar da var tabi. Bunlardan 1.si topluluk,tünnelleyip kamplayan henüz zihinsel gelişimini tamamlayamamış ergen çok fazla oyuncu var. Malesef Rus toksisitesini bu oyunda da görebilirsiniz. Eğer arkadaşlarınızla oynayacaksanız çok keyif alabilirsiniz. Tek oynayacaksınız bazen takım arkadaşlarınıza ve katillere tilt olup rage atabilirsiniz. Peygamber sabrına sahipseniz alın oynayın derim aksi taktirde psikolojik destek almak zorunda kalabilirsiniz. Geliştiricilerden de kamplama ,tünelleme üzerine bi şey beklemeyin oyuncu oyuncudur,para paradır kafasındalar. Oyunu ben sigaraya benzetiyorum zararlı ama bırakamıyosun. Psikolog veya psikiyatr tanıdığınız varsa sizin için kolay olacaktır. Keyifli oyunlar dilerim.

Encore un trés bon jeu, bien marrant, où la commu se demerde pour tout pourrir.... mais quelle honte serieux....Je parle même pas de tunnel ou de face camp là... même coté survivants, les gens se debrouillent pour faire de l'antijeu en vous amenant le tueur directement dessus pour pas que vous puissiez faire les moteurs. bref... un bon jeu : oui ! une communauté sans matiére grise ? aussi !

Edit : je suis revenu sur le jeu... c'est pire aujourd'hui... bravo...vous etes fort pour ruiner les jeux...vraiment trés fort !

El juego como tal, la idea, ambientación y mecánicas es una maravilla, un juego al que puedes echarle tropecientas mil horas y pasártelo como un enano. El problema está cuando dejas a cargo del desarrollo a un equipo de monos que se sustituyeron los dedos por cuchillos para clavarse en los ojos los unos a los otros, por que no es ni medio normal lo mal balanceado que está el juego. Este tipo de juegos requieren de un estudio minucioso para no desbalancear a ninguno de los dos equipos, supervivientes o killers, y en su puta vida han hecho eso. Por temporadas jugar como survivor es la peste, y por temporadas lo es hacerlo como asesino, por no decir que hablamos de otra empresa que se ha sumado al carrito de parir DLC's como si fuera una coneja ninfómana, con Perks de mierda para supervivientes y 1230914 perks de ver auras para asesinos. Pero eh, las skins son super chulas, ojo, que con eso se perdona que Behaviour sea una empresa más puerca que Pumba.
Oh si, y lo más importante, tómense la pastilla anti-sarcasmo para esta: LA COMUNIDAD ES SANÍSIMA Y NUNCA NUNCA NUNCA HAY INSULTOS, AMENAZAS DE MUERTE, PELEAS NI NADA POR EL ESTILO. Con 0 control por parte de los devs. En fin, que el juego podría ser de lo mejorcito si le dedicaran mimo e intelecto al proyecto. Aún así oye, por 5e le puedes meter más horas de lo que le dedicarás a la educación de tus hijos, así que GG.

This game is garbage. I have played more then enough to give it a fair shake and it never ceases to disappoint me. 

Negatives: 
-Match making is horrendous. It takes forever, and still somehow manages to match you with people wildly under or over your skill level
-The grind is beyond insane. And it is absolutely needed to compete at any sort of competent level
-Character traits (After grinding forever) can be shared across all chars, making the idea of individual people with strengths and weaknesses completely moot.
-The game itself is setup to basically do nothing. Half of a match is just you sitting on a generator hitting essentially a quick time event or on a hook rapidly pushing the spacebar. Put that downtime in with the massive ques and you may get 15 minutes of gameplay an hour, if that.
-The community is trash. People are not friendly and you will usually get someone who disconnects or purposefully dies immediately if they are hooked first.
-Unbalanced AF. It quickly becomes apparent that the grind is needed to basically get the top tier perks from each survivor or killer to just kind of make some god tier char. When the difference between some perks are you can loot semi faster and every person on the map is revealed to you for 15 seconds, it becomes apparent who has grinded away at the game and who hasn't.

Those are the big ones. These next ones are maybe just a me thing, but my god, does it irritate the living hell out of me

-Sound design. Sound is absolutely needed for this game, there is no way around that. Which is fine! I love using space like this in interesting ways. The problem is, it isn't very interesting. It is mostly just different sound cues for various events. Not bad, but not good. But there is a way you can hear wounded people as the killer, because the sound for survivors that are wounded is CONSTANT and can not be turned down. It gets supremely old very fast.
-Daily quests are basically needed to do any real progression in the game. However, they are bizarrely specific for certain characters and will clog up your feed with killer ones that you don't even play or ones for survivors you haven't leveled at all. Forcing you to play under powered characters or something you don't really want to do. Yes, you can cycle a single one a day, but it will just give you another killer task that you may not want to do because you only play with friends or whatever. It is outdated and poorly designed... which is basically my entire review of the game.

Pros- I like seeing Michael Myers running around... that is cool. Horror setting is something I love, which may be why I kept giving this game multiple chances. It doesn't need to be rebuilt from the ground up, but it needs massive changes to the core of the game and so many QoL updates as to make it an exercise in frustration.

Oh god, I didn't even get into the whole bloodweb thing, offerings that are just dumb, set number of items to use and equip... my head hurts.

Oyun korku ve strateji oyunu. Eğer hayatta kalan(kurban) olarak oynayacaksanız, iyi bir takım oyuncusu olmanız gerekiyor. Eğer katil olarak oynayacaksanız soğuk kanlı bir şekilde 4 kurbana karşı mücadele vermeniz gerekiyor.  Oyunu oynarken ilk 50 saat gerçekten oyunu anlamakla geçiyor. Yetenekler, katilin özellikleri, katilin yetenekleri, taktikleri anlamak gerçekten video izlemeden anlaşılması zor. Oyunu alacaksanız, videolarını izleyin türkçe ve ingilizce bir sürü video bulunuyor.

Что же я могу о ней сказать? Игра по мне очень классная из-за её геймплея. Но есть плюсы и минусы (как и везде)
Плюсы:
Система прокачки 
Разнообразие персонажей 
Боле-менее комьюните 
Частые ивенты и обновления
Минусы: 
Много багов
Читеры (в момент написания обзора их стало больше)

Я советую купить эту игру, но лучше играть с друзьями, так веселее. 
Всем хорошей игры и удачи!
